price: Kuma wata ƙungiya daga Mutãnen Littãfi ta ce: "Ku yi ĩmãni da abin da aka saukar a kan waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni (da Muhammadu) a farkon yini, kuma ku kãfirta a ƙarshensa; tsammãninsu, zã su kõmõ."
arabic: وَقَالَت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ءَامِنُواْ بِٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَجۡهَ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَٱكۡفُرُوٓاْ ءَاخِرَهُۥ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālat ṭāifatun min ahli al-kitābi āminū bi-alladhī unzila ʿalā alladhīna āmanū wajha al-nahāri wa-uk'furū ākhirahu laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
